controllerServices.name: Distributed Map Cache Client Service for CDC

entry.value:
import json import java.io import itertools from datetime import datetime import os import time import glob from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback
class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback): def __init__(self,flowfile): self.ff = flowfile pass
def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): try: text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) config = json.loads(text) htype = config['type'] op_type = htype[0].upper() Columns = config['columns'] finalESJsonList = json.loads("[]") singleJson = {} for singleAggList in Columns: singleJson[str(singleAggList['name'])] = singleAggList['value'] singleJson['op'] = op_type finalESJsonList.append(singleJson) outputStream.write(bytearray(json.dumps(finalESJsonList, indent=4).encode('utf-8'))) except: pass
flowFile = session.get() if(flowFile != None): flowFile = session.write(flowFile,PyStreamCallback(flowFile)) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
